title: Abdullah Öcalan
summary: Abdullah Öcalan (/ˈoʊdʒəlɑːn/ OH-jə-lahn;[10] Turkish: [œdʒaɫan]; born 4 April 1949), also known as Apo[10][11] (short for both Abdullah and "uncle" in Kurdish),[12][13] is a Kurdish political prisoner[14][15] and founding member of the militant Kurdistan Workers' Party (PKK).[16][17][18][19]
